title: New serious plat III+ Ranked 5's Team
body:
This team will be looking to climb up the ladders to victory, all players must be atleast **plat III and higher, plat IV-V** will be taken into deep consideration by existing team members. 

There will be 5 main members and atleast 2 subs to fill any necessary needs incase a main member cannot play.
**Comms:** Skype Required (Mic required. Players must be active in chat).
**Times:** Members must be able to play at 4 pm-7pm  AEST on most days (Can vary/Alternate for teams benefit).

Strictly no negative behavior. Cursing is acceptable, excessively is not. No offensive remarks or terms are to be used during team play or individual play.
All positions available.

**Attention Potential Applicants**
Even if your preferred role has already been applied for, please still submit an application. Players often drop from teams in the early stages by either choice or request. We may need you!

**To apply, reply to this thread. Or add me in game, IGN: Dravening.**

replies.body: Just created a new team, Feel free to reply to this comment for interests

Ign: Seethingsin
League solo que: Diamond 5 
Positions: Mid main however can sub for adc and jungle
I am a strong captain if need be but the best thing about me is that I am a very positive person. I get along with everyone really well and I am always hard working when it comes to improving.

ADC

I have been part of a few ranked team previously, all of them doing pretty well.
Hi, diam in two accounts last season, plat 4 atm duo to not playing soloqueue. i want to focus in ranked 5s. top main.
thats a very good start for your team. all the best,

**IGN:** _SS Meliodas_
Platinum II, Season IV Diamond; Recently transferred from EU West. 
I main both Top and Mid lane however can adapt to fit any role as required. 
I have been looking to join a serious ranked team for a while!
